item.title: quok
item.description: stream/buy: soundcloud, bandcamp years active: 2013 - 2019 a picture of quok. (image source) quok’s music aligns perfectly with my sensibilities. off-kilter beats, frequent glitches and flairs of sound design, and nuanced song structures are all elements of his songs that i enjoy. his production usually isn’t perfect, and oftentimes his english lyrics are rather odd. his discography contains recurring musical and lyrical motifs that persist across his various albums.
